system.description:
You can change the damage type of your eldritch blast to the damage type of the type of genie you chose. If you do so, it gains an additional effect.

  • Cold: The target must make a Constitution saving throw against your spell save DC or be slowed until the end of its next turn.
  • Fire: The target is set alight and takes 1d6 ongoing fire damage. The environment or an action can put this fire out, ending the effect.
  • Bludgeoning: the target is knocked back up to 10ft and knocked prone.
  • Lightning: The target cannot take reactions until the start of its next turn.
